title: Vacation Policy
content: Employees are entitled to 20 days of paid vacation per year. Unused days expire.

unused_days.assumption: Expiration at end of calendar year unless specified

title: Sick Leave
content: Employees may take sick leave with manager approval.

annual_limit.assumption: Typical sick leave allowance in absence of explicit policy

title: Parental Leave
content: Maternity leave is available. Details missing.
